ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine didn t have time to catch the falling Ramhorn, he approached his slow moving body watching the battlefield as he moved. He s functional , Lunarpine

Lunarpine didn't have time to catch the falling Ramhorn, he 
approached his slow moving body watching the battlefield as he 
moved. "He's functional", Lunarpine replied to Ramhorns question, 
Shadow Wing, give me a hand getting him inside, he needs immediate 
attention."

OOC I wasn't arguing his rank, I (Lunarpine) am still learning the 
chain of command. I'm just a little bit in shock that someone 
accually used the word "Order" I think that's the first time since I 
started that someone took charge of a situation.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Just to inform you, Cyberwolf, Ramulus has been in the Neo Beast 
Wars since 
> almost the very begining. I know Lunarpine has no way of knowing 
that, but 
> I'm just saying.
> 
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus looks over at Lunarpine, hoping the fellow Maximal would 
catch 
> Ramhorn. He growls as he looks at the retreating Newcomers, then 
back at 
> Lunarpine.
> 
> "Is he alive?" he asks, reffering to Ramhorn.
